definition[0]: used when you compare things to say that one of them is the best, worst etc that there has ever been
example[0]: They reached an all-time record score.
example[1]: The price of wheat had reached an all-time low.
definition[1]: the lowest or highest that something has ever been
example[2]: The news caused the dollar to fall to an all-time low against the euro.
example[3]: Orders rose 35% to an all-time high for May.
